mapper.select: SELECT PART_CLASS_SEQ, CENTER_CD, PART_CLASS, FN_DETAILCODENM(PART_CLASS) AS PART_CLASS_NM, PART_PAY_COST, PART_ICON, USE_YN FROM TSEB_CENTER_PART_CLASS_D WHERE PART_CLASS_SEQ = #{value}

SELECT A.PART_CLASS_SEQ, FN_DETAILCODENM(A.PART_CLASS) AS PART_CLASS_NM, A.PART_PAY_COST, A.PART_ICON FROM TSEB_CENTER_PART_CLASS_D A WHERE A.CENTER_CD = #{centerCd} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PART_CLASS_ORDER ASC
